name: Troy Lamarr Chew II - The Roof is on Fire

metadata.description: Troy Lamarr Chew II is launching NFTs to accompany his first solo show with Altman Siegel The Roof is on Fire. The project expands upon his body of work adding legendary hip-hop dance crazes to the artistâ€™s ever evolving pictorial dictionary. Troy Lamarr Chew II filmed friends and family performing each dance move referenced in the paintings. There will be 36 NFTs in total representing a combination of each painting and unique associated dance.
metadata.name: Soulja boy tol' Em
